acf.module_short_description: Master how to organise and structure the content on your website.
acf.module_long_description: In this module, you will learn how to organise and structure your website for both users and search engines and understand the important of including trust signals throughout your site to convey E-A-T (Expertise-Authoritativeness-Trustworthiness). You will also master the concept of Natural Language Processing, a technique that search engines like Google use to understand language on the web.
